snippet.title: Hope springs eternal? The best and worst case scenarios for every NBA team
snippet.description:
Hope springs eternal? The best and worst case scenarios for every NBA team by Paul Flannery on Oct 24 2013, 11:34a
Preseason is a time for big dreams and big fears. We run down very serious best- and worst-case scenarios for every NBA team this season.

snippet.title: A real world series: Inside the world championship of blind baseball
snippet.description:
A real world series: Inside the world championship of blind baseball by Peter Richmond on Feb 14 2013, 11:11a
Pitchers and catchers. It used to be a magical phrase. It buried the past. It meant that this might be the year for Royals and the Pirates. It erased the last memories of a World Series that, most...
